name: TankFX
description:
https://forms.gle/B2UzqgV7ZHjdwQ9s6 Take this survey after playing to complete the experiment!

This game was created for a school research project that was assigned to me. 

Make sure to be in fullscreen and have your audio turned up when playing.

There are 10 LEVELS that you have to complete.

Visual and Auditory effects will increase over time! Shoot the red tanks each level to move on to the next! Be careful, though! If you touch a red tank, your tank will be obliterated.

Use WASD to move. Aim with your mouse and click to shoot a bullet
